info.titleen: I was driving at about 40 miles per hour.
info.descko: 엄마의 생일선물을 고민하는 남자친구를 위해 여자친구가 제안한 방법은?
info.descen: How about baking a birthday cake for her?

sentense.en: Translation, Believe me, I've tried everything.
sentense.ko: 다시 말해 정말 안 해 본 게 없어요

sentense.en: And then, of course, there are the funerals.
So many more than I could imagine.
